title: Hint
text: Use Newton's second law $$(F=ma)$$ to find the net force and tension in the cable during acceleration.

title: Steps
text: Step 1: Apply Newton's second law $$(F=ma)$$ to find the net force and tension in the cable during acceleration. Step 2: Use the net force to calculate the tension considering the elevator's mass and acceleration. Step 3: Clearly show all calculations and units.
